name: smart-grocery-finder
description: Find the shortest, healthiest, and cheapest grocery stores for any item by zipcode

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd server && npm install
scripts.railway-build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
